title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Combate, Puerto Rico
content:
Photo submitted by Alexis Aponte of their mountain bike trip to Combate, Puerto Rico. We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Combate, Puerto Rico appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
